summary: An example script that showcases how to configure and run a HiFi-GAN speech synthesis model using NVIDIA NeMo, including setup of Hydra configuration, experiment management, and PyTorch Lightning execution.
business_intent: Provide developers with a ready-to-use reference for training or evaluating a high-fidelity generative adversarial network for text‑to‑speech, accelerating adoption of the HiFi‑GAN model in production pipelines.
